availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Maxwell (Kenton County, Kentucky, grocery store worker.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, grocery store worker. Kentucky native. Married to Kaziah Maxwell. Father of George Maxwell, Thomas Maxwell, Charles Maxwell, Laura Maxwell, Woodford Maxwell, and Mary Maxwell. Watchman in Kenton County in 1850. Grocery store worker in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 253A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 197.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 236.
